name: Grace Bay Beach
description: An absolutely idyllic setting. Golden sand edging crystal clear blue water with gently lapping waves - it's what postcards were made for.

name: Varadero Beach
description: Postcard perfect. The water was the bluest I’ve ever seen and the sand was powdery white.

name: Turquoise Bay
description: Words cannot capture how spectacular this beach is. Long stretches of white sand and crystal blue water. World class snorkeling for beginners as well as experienced.

name: Quarta Praia
description: Warm water with amazing views. When the sea calms down it forms amazing natural pools. When in Morro de São Paolo this beach is a must see.

name: Eagle Beach
description: Tranquil and pristine, the water is beautifully clear with no rocks or seaweed. The beach stretches as far as you can see.

name: Radhanagar Beach
location: Havelock Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands
description: Amazing clear turquoise water, mangrove forests in the background, pristine white sand and not too deep... what's not to like!

name: Baia do Sancho
description: A beautiful remote beach that can only be reached by descending ladders and stone steps. The majestic bluffs will take your breath away.

name: Trunk Bay Beach
location: Virgin Islands National Park, St. John
description: Great snorkeling with lobster, tarpon, squid, sea turtles and a beautiful beach, great place at sunset.

name: Baia dos Golfinhos
description: Whenever you go, there's no doubt you'll see dolphins! But the landscape alone is breathtaking.

name: Spiaggia dei Conigli
description: One of the marvels of the world. White sand beach, turquoise water, cooling sea breeze. Prepare for a 20-minute walk to get to the beach, but once you are there you feel like you're not on Earth.

name: Cable Beach
description: The sunsets are amazing, spacious grassed picnic areas, iconic camel rides and beach side restaurants.

name: Praia da Falesia
description: Gorgeous red sand cliffs lead to the green-blue ocean and a white sand beach that seemingly stretches forever.

name: Hapuna Beach State Recreation Area
description: There is a small set of rocks that provided some of the best snorkeling we saw on the island! The water was crystal clear and the brightly colored tropical fish plentiful.

name: Siesta Beach
description: Absolutely beautiful beach with silky quartz sand! Great beach for people watching, sunsets, breakfast/morning walk on beach and finding sand dollars.

name: Maho Bay Beach
description: A beautiful white sand beach known for snorkeling with sea turtles. We saw countless turtles and an octopus while snorkeling just off the beach.

name: Poipu Beach Park
description: There was amazing snorkeling area, a small beach shielded from the waves for the little ones, and surfing all within a short distance of each other.

name: Playa de Muro Beach
description: Playa de Muro has a wonderful, sandy beach with a warm, clear turquoise sea. Ideal for children because of its gentle, shallow waters.

name: Playa Manuel Antonio
description: Beautiful beach with patches of sparkly black sand and very few waves, idyllic to float and bask.

name: Playa Norte
description: The water is clear and every beautiful shade of blue you can imagine. It’s the very essence of true paradise.

name: Nungwi Beach
description: Amazing combination of white, velvet-like sands and water changing colors throughout the day, from light blue to emerald green.

name: Magens Bay
description: Beautiful Beach! Gorgeous colors! Great snorkeling right off the beach. Bring flippers if you want to get out a bit further to see some turtles.

name: Nissi Beach
description: Longish sweeping beach with lovely clear warm water with various tavernas along the way. Loads of sunbeds with umbrellas.

name: Bavaro Beach
description: The water is as crystal clear as you see in a magazine and the beach is well maintained with no rocks. A place of total relaxation.

name: Balos Lagoon
description: Feels like another planet. A breathtaking place with a lagoon on one side and a beach on the other.

name: Yonaha Maehama Beach
description: It’s a beach you can dream about. A lot of sand, clear and warm water and these views. It’s a perfect vacation spot.
